[vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1582715748891{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1582716204481{margin-bottom: -15px !important;}”]

GSC Banks offers “Safe Deposit Lockers “ designed to safeguard your valuables and are loaded with benefits that make them attractive.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3143″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3144″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner]

Features

[vc_column_text]

  • Enjoy attractive and most competitive rentals, hassle free rent payment and locker hirers have option to pay 3 years rent in advance.
  • Avail nomination facility of your lockers.
  • Ease of location: Locker facility available at our 32 branches out of 33 branches spread across Ahmedabad, Gandhinagar, Halvad & Gandhidham.
  • Extended timing for access of Safe Deposit Locker at our Naranpura Branch.
  • Lockers are available at 27 branches of GSC Bank in various sizes to meet your specific requirements.

[/vc_column_text]

Safe Deposit Locker Annual Charges

[vc_column_text]

TYPE 1 YEAR
A 700/-
B 900/-
C 1400/-
D 1600/-
E 1700/-
F 2500/-
G 2700/-
H1 3100/-
H 3300/-
L/L2/K 4500/-

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

NOTE:

[vc_column_text]

  • In case of loss of key of the lockers a service charge of Rs.500/-has to be recovered from hirers in addition to the actual expenses incurred for breaking open the lockers and changing the lock by manufacturers of lockers.
  • Locker rent for a period of 3 years shall be payable in advance by the hirers.
  • Interest on the said deposit shall be paid annually by crediting in SB/CD Account maintained with the bank. Standing instruction/ mandate to recover rent from such account on due date shall be obtained from the locker holder’s.
  • No refund of locker rent shall be admissible on premature surrender of the locker or other wise. Locker holder is required to operate the locker once in a year.
  • In case locker rent becomes overdue, operations in the locker will not be allowed.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]

Locate Us

For any query regarding Safe Deposit Lockers please contact the nearest branch of GSC Bank, to open Safe Deposit Lockers.

Branch & ATM Locator

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1584013505464{margin-top: -50px !important;}”]

GENERAL CONDITIONS:

[vc_column_text]

  • All charges are exclusive of applicable Taxes
  • Charges/rates are variable & subject to change without notice

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
